item.title: Adrien Brody's 3.5 Hour Acclaimed Drama Is Finally Streaming 2 Months After His Oscar-Winning Performance
item.description: The Brutalist, which is one of last year's best movies and earned Adrien Brody a Best Actor win at the 2025 Academy Awards, is finally streaming.

item.title: John Carpenter Called This 1980s Fantasy Horror His Most Underrated Movie, And I Have To Agree
item.description: John Carpenter has labeled this 1987 horror movie as his most underrated, and I think this film is among the director's most terrifying.

item.title: All 27 Confirmed Marvel Characters In Avengers: Doomsday, Ranked By Power Level
item.description: Marvel Studios has revealed several Avengers: Doomsday characters, and between heroes and villains, this is the order of how powerful they are.
